comments: This module defines functions for working with folds.

declarations.comments: Synonym for `preview`, flipped.
declarations.title: previewOn

declarations.comments: Synonym for `toListOf`, reversed.
declarations.title: toListOfOn

declarations.comments: Previews the first value of a fold, if there is any.
declarations.title: preview

declarations.comments: Folds all foci of a `Fold` to one. Note that this is the same as `view`.
declarations.title: foldOf

declarations.comments: Maps and then folds all foci of a `Fold`.
declarations.title: foldMapOf

declarations.comments: Right fold over a `Fold`.
declarations.title: foldrOf

declarations.comments: Left fold over a `Fold`.
declarations.title: foldlOf

declarations.comments: Collects the foci of a `Fold` into a list.
declarations.title: toListOf

declarations.comments: The first focus of a `Fold`, if there is any. Synonym for `preview`.
declarations.title: firstOf

declarations.comments: The last focus of a `Fold`, if there is any.
declarations.title: lastOf

declarations.comments: The maximum of all foci of a `Fold`, if there is any.
declarations.title: maximumOf

declarations.comments: The minimum of all foci of a `Fold`, if there is any.
declarations.title: minimumOf

declarations.comments: Whether all foci of a `Fold` satisfy a predicate.
declarations.title: allOf

declarations.comments: Whether any focus of a `Fold` satisfies a predicate.
declarations.title: anyOf

declarations.comments: The conjunction of all foci of a `Fold`.
declarations.title: andOf

declarations.comments: The disjunction of all foci of a `Fold`.
declarations.title: orOf

declarations.comments: Whether a `Fold` contains a given element.
declarations.title: elemOf

declarations.comments: Whether a `Fold` not contains a given element.
declarations.title: notElemOf

declarations.comments: The sum of all foci of a `Fold`.
declarations.title: sumOf

declarations.comments: The product of all foci of a `Fold`.
declarations.title: productOf

declarations.comments: The number of foci of a `Fold`.
declarations.title: lengthOf

declarations.comments: Find the first focus of a `Fold` that satisfies a predicate, if there is any.
declarations.title: findOf

declarations.comments:
Sequence the foci of a `Fold`, pulling out an `Applicative`, and ignore
the result. If you need the result, see `sequenceOf` for `Traversal`s.
declarations.title: sequenceOf_

declarations.comments: Traverse the foci of a `Fold`, discarding the results.
declarations.title: traverseOf_

declarations.comments: Determines whether a `Fold` has at least one focus.
declarations.title: has

declarations.comments: Determines whether a `Fold` does not have a focus.
declarations.title: hasn't

declarations.comments: Replicates the elements of a fold.
declarations.title: replicated

declarations.comments: Filters on a predicate.
declarations.title: filtered

declarations.comments: Folds over a `Foldable` container.
declarations.title: folded

declarations.comments: Builds a `Fold` using an unfold.
declarations.title: unfolded

declarations.comments: Collects the foci of a `Fold` into an array.
declarations.title: toArrayOf

declarations.comments: Synonym for `toArrayOf`, reversed.
declarations.title: toArrayOfOn

declarations.comments: Fold map over an `IndexedFold`.
declarations.title: ifoldMapOf

declarations.comments: Right fold over an `IndexedFold`.
declarations.title: ifoldrOf

declarations.comments: Left fold over an `IndexedFold`.
declarations.title: ifoldlOf

declarations.comments: Whether all foci of an `IndexedFold` satisfy a predicate.
declarations.title: iallOf

declarations.comments: Whether any focus of an `IndexedFold` satisfies a predicate.
declarations.title: ianyOf

declarations.comments:
Find the first focus of an `IndexedFold` that satisfies a predicate, if
there is any.
declarations.title: ifindOf

declarations.comments: Collects the foci of an `IndexedFold` into a list.
declarations.title: itoListOf

declarations.comments: Traverse the foci of an `IndexedFold`, discarding the results.
declarations.title: itraverseOf_

declarations.comments: Flipped version of `itraverseOf_`.
declarations.title: iforOf_

name: Data.Lens.Fold
